alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 1:27PM CST until January 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Near blizzard conditions expected at times, especially in open country with falling snow. Total snow accumulations less than 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Devils Lake to Valley City region into the northern Red River Valley. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact tonight`s commute and the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Roseau; West Marshall
